structure.unit: STATE UNIVERSITIES AND COLLEGES -- REGIONAL EDUCATION -- ARCHAEOLOGY

law.catch_line: Publication of admissions criteria by public professional schools.
law.text: Every institution of higher education in the Commonwealth of Kentucky offering professional education programs in the areas of medicine and dentistry shall establish and publish the criteria by which applicants for admission are evaluated and the approximate weight of each criteria including a criterion based upon permanent residence in underserved or underrepresented areas of the Commonwealth.
law.history: Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 20, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1980.
